title: Physical Symptoms
content:
Unexplained aches and pains
Frequent headaches or stomach issues
Feeling constantly tired or drained
Restlessness or agitation

title: Work/School Performance Issues
content:
Decline in performance at work or school
Trouble completing tasks or meeting deadlines
Difficulty interacting with colleagues or classmates
Why people with mental illness may not seek or receive treatment
There are several reasons why people with mental illness may not seek or receive treatment. These reasons can be categorized into individual, societal, and systemic barriers.

title: 1. Individual Barriers
content:
Lack of Awareness
Stigma and discrimination

title: Social Stigma
content:
Lack of Support from Family/Friends
Fear of Consequences
3. Systemic and Healthcare Barriers
Limited Access to Services
